docs.text: big courtroom thrillers have always captivated america .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: o . j .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: simpson , tom capano , the menendez brothers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all these names are synonymous to americans and courtrooms .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and , of course , courtroom dramas are not a new topic to hollywood .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: whether it be john grisham's thrilling novels or television's famous dramas , the courtroom has always provided big bucks .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so when i rented a civil action , i was expecting the film to be like the rainmaker , a brilliant law film that kept viewers on the edge of their seat .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , what i saw in a civil action was far different from what i expected , a major surprise , but fortunately , a pleasant one .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: john travolta always seems to come up big when you least expect it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no one expected him to light up the screen in grease , nor in saturday night fever .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but , whenever he gets knocked down , he always seems to come back fighting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a civil action is not john's best performance , but a strong one that could rival any performance in 1998 .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: travolta proves that a normal and believable performance can vault a film into oscar nominations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his performance is not flashy , nor memorable , just solid .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if he delivered the only solid performance , this film would still be average .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: luckily , he has a strong supporting cast .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: william h . macy is probably one of the most underrated actors in hollywood .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he continues to deliver great performances one after the other , but he is still regarded as a secondary actor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in a civil action , he delivers yet another great performance as travolta's paranoid and greedy accountant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he is not a lovable character , but a character who stands out in your mind whenever you think of the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he is not one of the big time lawyers , just a measly accountant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but , he delivers one of the best supporting roles of 1998 , but there is actually someone better in a civil action .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: robert duvall is also an underrated actor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he gets many leading roles , but is never heard when you hear of big box office draws like tom hanks , brad pitt and jim carrey .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: duvall has a supporting role in this as a lawyer of the co-defendant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: duvall is magical in this role .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he is the wise teacher , who not only battles it out in the courtroom , but also manages to teach every major player a lesson , in his own twisted way .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in many non-comedic films , directors are always trying to find a way to implement a touch of comedy , to keep the audience on their toes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: unfortunately , they usually just key in on one character whose main objective is to be funny ( jar-jar binks , anyone ? ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , this usually backfires because the character is never fully developed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is not the case in a civil action .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they have comedy coming from all sides .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: whether it be duvall's inane questions or macy's sharp anger , the laughs come in a steady pace .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: granted , it's not roll in the aisle funny , but it provides a nice addition to the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the plot is terrific- somewhat .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the setup is nice with the film actually starting with a victory in the courtroom .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then the case that will make or break jan ( travolta ) 's career rears its ugly head .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they find out the goldmine involved with the case and wind up taking it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , budgets soon flounder and jan finds himself in deep debt .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i will not spoil the rest , although i must speak of the one downside to the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the courtroom debates are great , but the actual problem they are fighting for is never fully explored .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it left me somewhat confused , although the rest of the film is terrific .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all in all , john travolta is back yet again in this great film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his supporting cast , consisting of macy and duvall , turn in tremendous performances , which ease the load on travolta .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film is smart , witty and thought provoking .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not only does it gauge in-court battles , but also the various tolls it can take on the major players .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a civil action provides everything a drama lover craves .
docs.label: positive
